title: Health Care Down on Rotation Into Financial, Energy Sectors — Health Care Roundup
text:
Health-care companies fell as traders rotated out of defensive sectors into energy and financial areas of the market.

Juul Labs made unauthorized claims to adults and children that its electronic cigarettes were safer than traditional cigarettes, the Food and Drug Administration said, in a letter to the e-cigarette maker.

Swiss drug maker Novartis, under fire for keeping a data-manipulation issue under wraps for several months, vowed to more quickly disclose any similar concerns in the future.

Write to Rob Curran at rob.curran@dowjones.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

September 09, 2019 16:56 ET (20:56 GMT)
